full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM 'KHRID 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG GI GSUNG BSHAD ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA BLA MA MNYES PAR BYED PA'I MCHOD SPRIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @629A *, ,CES LAM 'KHRID 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG GI GSUNG BSHAD ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA 'DI NI, LAM YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I BKA' DRIN DANG LAM 'BREL LHAG PAR CHE BA, DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RIN PO CHE BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO DAPL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI, LAM 'KHRID 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG GI BSHAD LUNG GNANG SKABS, BDE LAM DANG ZHAL LUNG GNYIS 'KHRID YIG SO SO BA TZAM YIN KYANG GNYIS KA'I MAN NGAG LA MI 'DRA BA MED, CES RGYUN MTSAN YANG DAG DANG BCAS BDE LAM DU ZHAL BZHES SU MDZAD PA'I MAN NGAG 'DIR YANG SBYAR NAS GSUNG BSHAD RGYA CHER BSTZAL BAR, PHRAN BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BA, DKA' BCU PA BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG GIS ZIN THO TZAM ZHIG TU BKOD KYANG, LE LO'I DBANG GIS 'PHRAL DU ZIN BRIS SU 'GOD MA THUB PAR LO MANG PO ZHIG SONG BA'I RJES SU, SNGAR GYI ZIN THO LA ZHIG TU BRTAGS PAS DRAN YUL DU GANG YOD PA RNAMS GAR RGYAS SU BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,
